entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 08:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 70 gusting to 90 near Bowen Island this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
